title: Producing & Distributing A Film To Audiences
description:
An upcoming film education screening that I hope you will be interested in at the Arts Picturehouse Cinema in Cambridge.

Producing & Distributing A Film To Audiences

Tuesday 15th March, 10.00am – 12.45pm

 

Producer Catherine Bray (Beyond Clueless and the BBC’s Fear Itself) and Distributor Tom Abell from Peccadillo Pictures (Appropriate Behavior, 52 Tuesdays) will discuss their experiences of producing and distributing films in the UK and US. This will then be followed by a feature film screening.

 

Appropriate Behavior (15)

 

Director: Desiree Akhavan. Starring: Desiree Akhavan, Rebecca Henderson, Hally Feiffer. USA 2015. English/Persian with subtitles. 86 mins.

 

Shirin is struggling to become an ideal Persian daughter, politically correct, bisexual and hip young Brooklynite but fails miserably in her attempt at all identities. Following a family announcement of her brother’s betrothal to a parentally approved Iranian prize catch, she embarks on her own private rebellion.

 

Suitable for English/Film/Media Studies. 

 

Cost: £4.00 per student. Teachers free. 

 

To book your ticket: click here
